name: Cargo (ArjahnFafenfef, ReconSox, Thom "dot com" Craver)
description:
A game made for the ScoreSpace Jam #18.

You control a cargo ship who lost their cargo in an asteroid belt. This jam's theme was magnetic, and also wanted to use a leaderboard.

Description

Navigate your ship though the dangerous asteroid field, using your photon torpedo's if necessary. Use your tractor beam to pick up cargo. Hitting them straight on will damage your ship. You can exchange your cargo for valuable upgrades to your ship.

Score points by shooting asteroids and collecting cargo.

Can you make it onto the global leaderboard?

Controls:

ARROW KEYS: To move the ship

Z: to shoot / select

X: to use tractor beam / go back

Assets Used:

tobylane - from pixabay

Free assets from pixabay, Zapsplat.com

Graphics created by Thom Craver and ReconSox

Ship  from http://www.shipschematics.net/
